pageProps.content:
Experience

The exceptional Kings Camp is situated in a quiet corner of the famous Timbavati Reserve, adjacent to the Kruger National Park in South Africa.
Kings Camp reflects something of a romantic, colonial Africa & faces an open savanna plain with a waterhole, which is visited by a wide variety of animals.

Stay

The camp features 7 luxury suites, 2 honeymoon suites & 1 private villa named Waterbuck Private Villa.
The luxury suites are equipped with an en-suite bathroom, Victorian ball-&-claw bath, indoor & outdoor shower & private verandah with splash pool. All suites have large glass windows looking out over the bushveld.
The honeymoon suites are larger & also includes a Nespresso coffee machine.
Kings Camp also comprises a main area with a spacious lounge, dining room, small library with bushveld views, swimming pool & wine cellar.
Kings Camp’s Waterbuck Villa boasts 4 en-suite bedrooms with a private vehicle, game-ranger, personal butler & chef.

Activities

Professional guides will accompany guests on open 4x4 game drives twice a day. Optional bush walks are also on offer for the more adventurous at heart.
Guests can also enjoy relaxing spa treatments at the wellness spa or make use of the gym.

subfolders.title: Makanyi Lodge
subfolders.description: Makanyi Lodge is a private safari haven in the heart of the Timbavati Game Reserve in the Greater Kruger region. The lodge overlooks a permanent waterhole & is frequented by animals daily – so guests can sit on the deck while watching them drink or play in the water below.

subfolders.title: Motswari Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: Motswari Game Lodge lies in the Timbavati Reserve, part of the Greater Kruger National Park Conservancy & is home to Africa’s Big 5. This area is popular for its frequent Big 5 sightings as well as the elusive wild dog & cheetah.
